attributes.documentation: @title The Controller interface provides access to an external list of controllers.
attributes.name: IController

attributes.documentation: @title Controller stores a list of controller addresses that can be used for authentication in other contracts.
attributes.name: Controller

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor initializes the owner with the provided address.
 @param _account address of the owner.
@dev Reverts if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Checks if message sender is an admin.
attributes.name: onlyAdmin

attributes.documentation:
@dev Add a new admin to the list of admins.
 @param _account address to add to the list of admins.
attributes.name: addAdmin

attributes.documentation:
@dev Remove a admin from the list of admins.
 @param _account address to remove from the list of admins.
attributes.name: removeAdmin

attributes.documentation: @return true if the provided account is an admin.
attributes.name: isAdmin

attributes.documentation: @dev Internal-only function that adds a new admin.
attributes.name: _addAdmin

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "provided account is already an admin"

attributes.type: literal_string "provided account is already an admin"
attributes.value: provided account is already an admin

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "provided account is not an admin"

attributes.value: provided account is not an admin

attributes.documentation: @dev Checks if message sender is a controller.
